channel.title: Rics NoteBook
channel.description: Studying the Art of Science & the Science of Art

item.title: Harvest Hubs: Community Gardens Fueling Local Tables & Civic Services
item.description: A neighborhood garden network whose produce sales underwrite municipal services, supply affordable farm‑fresh vegetables to restaurants, and feed food‑insecure residents.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: Fruit Trees on Every Quad: Why College Campuses Should Feed the Future
item.description: Imagine walking to class and picking a fresh orange, apple, or fig right off a tree. With fruit trees and campus compost systems, universities can feed students, nourish ecosystems, and plant a legacy of regenerative abundance.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
